Package com.example.goldencarrot.data.db

Class NotificationRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.goldencarrot.data.db.NotificationRepository
public class NotificationRepository extends Object
This class provides the necessary methods to write, delete, update, and fetch notifications from the notifications table in Firebase

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    NotificationRepository.NotificationCallback<T>
    Callback interface to handle results or failures of notification operations.

      callback - interface to add logic to the query resul

    • updateNotification

      public void updateNotification(String notificationId, Map<String,Object> updates, NotificationRepository.NotificationCallback<Boolean> callback)
      Updates a notification in Firestore with the provided updates.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The ID of the notification to update.
      updates - The map of fields to update in the notification.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • deleteNotification

      public void deleteNotification(String notificationId, NotificationRepository.NotificationCallback<Boolean> callback)
      Deletes a notification by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The ID of the notification to delete.
      callback - The callback to handle success or failure.

    • getNotificationsByUserId

      public void getNotificationsByUserId(String userId, NotificationRepository.NotificationCallback<List<Notification>> callback)
      Retrieves all notifications associated with a specific user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID to query for notifications.
      callback - The callback to handle the list of notifications or failure.
